text: Pollaiolo or Pollaiuolo is the name of several people, including: * Antonio del Pollaiolo (1429/1433–1498), Italian Renaissance artist * Piero del Pollaiolo (1443–1496), Italian Renaissance artist, brother of Antonio * Simone del Pollaiolo (1457–1508), Italian Renaissance architect, nephew of Antonio and Piero. ==See also== * Carlo Francesco Pollarolo (1653–1723), Italian composer.
title: Pollaiolo
